1.content: It has been one day since you stayed at Ponyville. It was quite a peaceful place to live but there was one thing you didn't have. You don't have friends. You were a pony alright but you were just to shy to try to befriend other ponies. Today, you were going to try make some friends. You walk outside your house and start walking towards...
1.title: Welcome to Ponyville

11.content:
You decide to walk on the countryside dirt road to the nearby farm. You've heard the talk of their delicious apples and you might as well just go to the farm to buy some of their apples and maybe make some new friends. You soon reach the farm looking at the wonderful landscape. You could see a big rusty barn, a small house and many of their apple trees in the distance. You go up to their small house and knock on their door waiting for somepony to answer.

Who answers the door?
11.title: Sweet Apple Acres

choices: You run into someone down the road
111.content:
You knock your hoof agianst the wooden door several times. Just from the feel of the dooor you could tell it been there for awhile. As the secounds dragged by you grew more and more nervous. Maybe no ones home, you say to yourself before turning tail and beggin the trek back to the room you were renting. Thinking about it you needed to get a job soon otherwise you might not make the next payment. With that lingering thought you heard a voice behind you.

"Something I could help you with Sugarcube?" Came the voice, definitly female and definitly a southern accent. Feeling rather foolish you spun around to face her, the mare had an orange coat with three shiny red apples on her flank as her cutie mark, you winced and shook your head to clear that thought out of your mind. Her mane and tail were blond and bound with rope at the ends. She had green eyes and wore a cowboy hat, she looked kina cute actually. But you cant let your imagination get ahead of you, food and a job were your main priorities.

"Uhhh, yeah. I was wondering if I could purchase a bushle of your cheapest apples?" You say uncertainly, while mentally berating yourself for your uncertanty. The orange pony nodded excitedly racing off an returning with two large baskets filled with apples.

"That'll be twenty bits sir."

You nod and toss her the coins, "Thanks!" Wih that done you beggin to take your leave loaded with juicy apples. But a thought struck you, she was the only pony here that you knew of, and judging by the hundreds of apple trees she would need some help come harvest time. "Actually, would it be possible to get a job here?" You asked suddenly.

"Welp, I dont know, we usually dont need any help around here..."

We? Guess she does have help, you thought to yourself. "Okay then, thanks anyway!"

"Wow there doggie I didnt say no." You turn to face her once more. "Big Machintosh went to visit Appalooza this harvest season so I could use an extra pair of hooves, your hired. Whats your name?"

Trying hard to contian the feeling of triumph within you respond, "Names Blaze. How about your name?"

"Applejack, be here tomarrow morning at sunrise!" She turned and trotted inside her barn. And with a grn on your face you canter back down the road to your room excited for the next day.

As soon as Applejack had made it indoors she lookwed out the window, Nopony has ever asked to work here before, and I have never seen him around. He mut be new. She mused to herself watching Blaze canter away. He was a bit of an odd character.
111.title: Applejack

1111.content:
The familiar ringing of your clock woke you up rather rudely. You had been anticipatng this moment for awhile, but now that it was here you just wanted to close your eyes and sleep. However you had a job to do, and there was that cute Applejack mare. You looked forward to getting to meet her. Slowly you allow yourself to rool out of bed and fall to the floor with a soft thud. After untangling yourself from the blankets you rinse your coat clean and stand in front of the mirrior. its the first time you have had a reason to look at yourself for along time.

Your coat was in good condition, a nice deep dark black with fiant, near invisible, grey lines running along your fur. Glancing at your name sake, your mane and tail both a firey orange color with streaks of yellow and red you make sure it looks nice before glancing at your flank with a sigh... 'Some ponies have it worse,' You say to yourself trying to push the thought out of your mind.

Quickly you throw the sheets and blankets back on the bed ad quietly leave the inn, as difficult as it was to find the right road in the dark you managed to arrive at Sweet Apple Acres just as the sun became visible on the horizon. suddenly Applejack threw open the barn doors shouting "YeeHah!" And galloping towards you.

"This way Blaze! We got alot of work ahead of us!" She lead you behind the barn and equiped you with a wagon full of empty baskets. "You need to fill all of these up by tomarrow morning. Ill be back to check on yall in a jiffy!" Then she wheeled around and galoped to a different part of the ochard. Glancing at the amount of baskets you groan and begin picking the apples of the trees.
1111.title: The Next Day

choices: Sorry, I got some stuff to do...
11111.content:
Using the wagon Applejack gave you, you begin jumping from the cart into the tree. Once there you carefully picked every apple off the tree and genty drop it into one of the baskets. It took nearly and hour and you had only managed to flll four of the baskets.

At that time Applejack came trotting over with two carts towed behind her overflowing with apples. She glance up at you as you struggled to get out of the tree safly. "What in taration are yall doing p there?"

"Pcking apples, I have only dropped a couple." You replied suddenly feeling very small.

"Sugarcube, that is not how you buck apples."

"Buck the apples? Wouldnt that damage them.?"

Applejack trotted towards a apple tree pivited on her forelegs and rapidly lashed out with her hind legs connecting with the trees trunck. The whole tree shuddered and every ripe apple on the tree fell from the tree into her saddlebags, without a single one touching the ground. "Howd ya like dem apples?" She asked with a cocky grin on her face.

You were embarressedd to say the least, and jumped out of the tree. Following her example ou walked up to the tree with two baskets on your back turned a 180 and bucked the tree. It quivered and rustled. Then came the apples all of which fell to the left or right of you brusing there sides. However a single apple rolled off the branch into one of the baskets. you held it up in mock triumph congering a small giggle from Applejack."Howd I do?"

"Horrible, but you will get better with practice. For now just fill the baskets and store them in the apple cellar." You nodded and quickly began scooping the falln apples into the baskets.

You spent the rest of your day bucking apples and loading up the baskets. As the sun set you were hualing the cart of baskets filled with apples to the cellar when Applejack appearred. "Hay, I was wondering if yall would being interested in some supper?"
11111.title: Work Hard, Play Hard

111111.content:
You took a secund to think about it, the orange pony was offering a free meal and a chance to get on the good side of her parents. "Sure, I would be honored." With that she led you into the barn doors to a surprisingly cozy home, with a table pilled high with all sorts of apple products. There were apple pies still smoking, fresh apples picked erlier today, apple crumplets, apple friters a whole plate full. And many other apple dishes. Slowly carring a large bowl of apple suace was a green pony that seemed to be quite old. Glancing at her flank shows a delicious looking apple pie. You quickly moved to help her with the bowl, "What a gentlecolt." She croaked loadly, "Applejack is this the feller you hired yesterday?" Applejack nodded quickly and ran to get the rest of dinner.

"Hi, my names Blaze, I hope im not intruding on any family time by me staying for supper."You introduce yourself cautiously.

"Well its nice to meet you Glaze and nah you aint bulling any family time. My names Granny Smith."

You decide to let the name mess up go unoticed. After she had finishes telling you a story about the apple family a green philly galloped in with a red bouncy mane and a high energy. "Hi you must be that colt My sister likes!" She shouted in rapid format. "My names AppleBloom and I cant wait to introduce you to my friends, how long you staying in ponyville anyway!?" She continued.

"Awhile. Who are your friends?"

"We are the Cutie Mark Crusaders!" She yelled. Before she continued Applejack rang the dinner bell and we enjoyed supper with some small talk and instructions on what you would be doing tomarrow. When it was time to leave you bid your goodbyes and thankyous and walked out the door to hear the thundering chrash of a lightning storm.

"Looks like the Pegasi have set up quite the downpour, perhaps you should stay here for the night." Applejack said surveying the storm.

"No, I dont want to impose on anyone."

"Its no problem at all,you can sleep in the hay loft and get right to work in the morning."

"Thank you for your hospitality." You smiled kindly recieving a likewise grin.
111111.title: Meeting the Apple family

1111111.content:
The next day, you wake up. It was about six in the morning and the sun was starting to come up.
You walk into the kitchen to find Granny Smith setting the table.
After some cereal and apple juice, Apple Bloom heads off to school and you and Applejack head out to buck trees.
What happens now?
1111111.title: The next day

choices: You want to stay here from now on
1111112.content:
You walk your way over to the stairs leading to the loft, still smiling at the hospitality of the Apples, especially Applejack. Why wouldn't you? After all, she had been so kind to you the second she saw you. As you climb the stairs, you can hear the rain pouring even harder than before and even felt a drop leak down. You don't worry about it much though, if this barn was made by that family, there was no doubt that it was of the best quality that they could have made. Finally reaching the loft, you stare at the mountains of hay that almost touched the ceiling. Finding a particularly soft bunch of it, you lay down and prepare for a well deserved rest. After all, you needed to be up bright and early to get back to work. Slowly, you close your eyes.... ready to dream.


You sit up and take a look around. Something didn't seem right. Your aptly colored mane is standing on edge as if something was watching you. You take a look around the loft but seem to find nothing. Realizing you must have just been hearing nothing, you try to lay back down. Before you can however, you hear the sound of hay crunching again. This time you get off of the hay and walk around. Before long the sound comes back......getting faster and louder. Before you can realize what's happening, you're brought down to the ground.......or wood and something is keeping you there. Whatever is holding you has the courtesy to let you see what it is and it turns you over. Due to the dim light, you can only see the being's eyes and the large bat-wings. Scared out of your mind, you begin to whimper until the creature nuzzles you. You look a little closer, confused by this odd behavior, and can't believe your eyes. "Applejack?" you whisper, now noticing the hat that the bat-pony sports. Seeming to be unable to speak, Applebat softly hisses as she nods. Her normally green eyes began to glow red, locking your attention on them. You yawn, beginning to feel drowsy. You realize she's trying to hypnotize you, but it's too late for you to mind. You drift off into sleep, letting the bat-pony do whatever she wants to do with you.

You wake up.... not remembering the strange ordeal you've been through. Looking out the window in the loft you realize that now would be the perfect time to get ready for work. Leaving the barn, you look to the orchard. The storm of last night had passed, leaving behind a wet look on all the trees. You walk to get your supplies and see Applejack. "Howdy sugarcube." she says as she waves over to you, "How are you feeling?" You simply say "Great." though you feel something different. You know what you feel... the feeling that....
1111112.title: Something unexpected happens

11111121.content: Also you going to explode cuz well side effects?
11111121.title: You want to stay here from now on

111111212.content:
"I was thinking," you say. "That I would like to move in with you lot."
Do they let you move in?
111111212.title: You lived yay.....

11111122.content: You really liked Applejack and thought she could be your...
11111122.title: You really like Applejack

111112.content:
"Sorry," you say, "but unfortunately there's something I need to do. Maybe later."
"Okay," says Applejack, "maybe next time. Then you can meet my sister and my granny."
"That sounds nice," you say, "looking forward to meeting them."

Then, you leave.

What is it you have to do?
111112.title: Sorry, I got some stuff to do...

11112.content:
You began to pick the apples when a little filly came up to you and asked your name.
It was....
11112.title: A Visitor.

1112.content:
You were cantering down the road and were so busy thinking about your new job that you didn't realise you bumped into someone.
"Oops, sorry," you say.
"It's quite all right," says somebody. But who is this somebody?
1112.title: You run into someone down the road

choices: You make it to Sweet Apple Acres in time.
11121.content: Oh my Celestia you've ran into the "Super Party Pony" herself Pinkie Pie. "Um h-hello there." "Hello there I've never seen YOU before. What's your name?" "It's Blaze. What's your name?" "My name's Pinkie Pie." "Nice to meet you Pinkie. Oh I'm sorry but I gotta go." "AWWWWW go where?" "I've gotta start my first day on the job at Sweet Apple Acres." "Oh well, see you when your done?" "Sure thing." As you run off to Sweet Apple Acres you don't realize that Pinkie Pie is planning a "Welcome to Ponyville" party.
11121.title: Pinkie Pie.

111211.content:
Finally, you arrived at Sweet Apple Acres.
"Welcome to your new job, Blaze," said Applejack.
What's your first task?
111211.title: You make it to Sweet Apple Acres in time.

1112113.content: I guess your not ready for that kind of work yet. But that's okay. There's still more work that you can do.
1112113.title: Other.

11121131.content:
"Okay," said Applejack, "Your first task is to plow the fields."
She put a yoke on you and tied you to a plow.
Soon, you were plowing away like nobody's business.
"Good job, Blaze!" she said when you were done.
What do you do now?
11121131.title: Plowing the fields.

111212.content: What happens on your way to work?
111212.title: Something ELSE happens.

112.content: You see a cute little yellow-colored pony with a pink bow on her head as well as a red mane and tail. "Why, hello there. I'm Apple Bloom. This is Sweet Apple Acres." and you giggle and say, "Well, I sure would like to buy some of your sweet apples." and she giggles and nods and asks, "Any types you're interested in?" and you reply...
112.title: Apple Bloom

choices: Stay and try to make friends.
1121.content:
"Can I have some red apples?" you ask.
"Sure," says Apple Bloom, bouncing off, "follow me!".

She leads you to an orchard where three Earth ponies are standing.
One of them is a large red stallion with short, orange mane and tail and a cutie mark of half a green apple and he's wearing a yoke around his neck.
One of them is a short, elderly-looking mare with an orange shawl, a pie as a cutie mark and her mane and tail tied up into buns.
The third is an orange mare with a cutie mark of three apples, a yellow mane and tail, tied up at the ends, and a cowfilly hat on.

"This pony wants some red apples," says Apple Bloom.
"Sure thing," says the orange mare and bucks a tree.
Some red apples fall down and she puts them into a bag.
"That'll be twelve bits," she says.

You hand over the money, take the apples, and...now what?
1121.title: "Red Apples"

1122.content:
"Can I have some green apples please?" you ask.
"Sure," says Apple Bloom.
"Applejack, somepony wants to buy some green apples."
After a while, an orange Earth mare with a yellow mane and tail and wearing a cowfilly hat prances up with a bag of green apples.
"That's twelve bits," she says.
You pass her the money and...
1122.title: "Green Apples"

1123.content:
"Zap Apples." and she replies, "Well, you came at a good time, we just harvested a good supply today." and runs inside and you hear her say, "Hey, big brother, we got a new customer!" and then you see a big red pony pulling a big cart of rainbow-colored apples. "Hello there, I'm Big Macintosh." and you giggle and say, "You sure are big." and he replies, "Eeyup. Now how much would you like?"

You think for a moment, then decide.
1123.title: Zap Apples.

choices: You try and make friends with the Apples.
11231.content:
"Just a few please," you say.
"Eeyup," says Big Mac and hands you five zap apples.
"That'll be twenty bits," says Apple Bloom.
You pay.
What happens now?
11231.title: A few

11232.content:
"Can I have a bunch of apples, please," you ask, wanting to make a pie out of the apples.
"Yup," says Big McIntosh and he hands you a bag of zap apples.
"That's fifty bits," says Apple Bloom.
You pay for the apples, and then...
11232.title: A bunch

11233.content:
"Can I have the whole cart?" you say.
Apple Bloom and Big Mac look surprised as they have never had a customer ask for that many apples.
Do they let you buy that many?
11233.title: The whole cart

113.content:
You knock on the door and it was answered by a short Earth mare who looked old.
Her coat was green, her ears were droopy, her white mane and tail were tied up into buns and she was wearing an orange shawl. Her cutie mark was a pie.
"Howdy," she says. "Welcome to Sweet Apple Acres, I'm Granny Smith."
"Hello," you say. "I would like to buy something,"
What do you want to buy?
113.title: Granny Smith

114.content:
And soon enough, somepony does answer!

He's a red Earth stallion with a straight, orange mane and tail cut somewhat short.
His hooves are yellow and he has some freckles on his face.
He is wearing a yoke around his neck and his cutie mark is half a green apple.

"Hello, sir, my name is Butter Magic, what's your name?"

"Big Macintosh", he says in a deep voice with a Southern American accent.

"Pleased to meet you, may I buy some apples?"

"Yup," he says.

What kind of apples do you buy?
114.title: Big Macintosh

choices: One of Apple Bloom's fellow Cutie Mark Crusaders.
115.content:
(Sorry if this chapter is too short).

So somepony answers the door, but it's not one of the Apples.

Somebody must be visiting the Mane Six but who?
115.title: Other

12.content: Nervous at what most of the other ponies will think of you, you decide to go to the library to read a book and maybe to socialise with other ponies who also like books. As you walk towards the library, you spot a nearby mirror. Curious at what you look like, you go walk towards the mirror seeing your face looking almost perfect. You are basically...
12.title: The Ponyville Library

choices: To go see Twilight and Spike
You can't decide(Interupted by Pinkie Pie)
122.content: "Hmm. I guess I look fair enough" you think to yourself. Your cafe brown coat seemed to shine in the light. You take off your robin's egg-blue dress hat to check it out, since you didn't get a chance to earlier. Sewn clearly on the sides was the your name. "Teardrop. Mom knows her sewing beats all." you say silently to yourself, so not to disturb any of the ponys reading. With your hat down, you swing your mane back into place. Your coal black mane whipped forward into a straight fancy look. Just the right style for a young stallion. With wings, you don't know why you wear black boot-like slippers, to which you trot some dust off. Your black tail is so groomed, it looked like a curvy wet paintbrush. The last thing you checked was your face. You always seemed to have that "I'm determined, but shy" look on your face. Your blue eyes sparkled with longing, yet with a small essence of timidness and adventure. You started to check out the book supply after you got your hat back on. As you scan over the fantasy books you notice a purple unicorn with a blue and pink mane search through multiple books like a machine. "She knows magic." you noted amzed at her speed. She also had a little purple dragon with green spikes going down his back. "Wow. I've never seen a dragon before. He's so cute." To not seem rude you pick up a book, and start fake reading. As you "read" you shoot small interested glances at the dragon. After a few moment of peering, the dragon shoots a curious glance at you. "Oh shoot" you whine in shock, as you throw the book up in your face. When you put the book down, you see the dragon's green eyes peering into yours. In shock you start to flutter up, but you were stopped by a gentle snag of the tail. You looked down to see the dragon holding your tail. He motion you to come down, so you obeyed since you didn't want to get him mad. When you reach the floor he motion you down closer to ear level. "Excuse me mister. May I have that book you have there? My friend was looking for that book." he said as he motioned to your book. "S..sure." you whimper as you felt his hand grasp around your hooves to recieve the book. "Thanks a lot, mister, uh?" he says as he looks at your hat. "Teardrop isn't it?" "Yes" you reply with some confidence. "That's a nice name. My name is Spike. That purple pony you saw is Twilight Sparkle. I'm her assistant. You should stop by the treehouse at the end of town. It's another library for Twilight and me. I'll see you later." Spike said as he walked back to Twilight. When he gave her the book, he pointed you out. "Thank you." she whispered loud enough for you to hear. You just wave as the two leave. "Hmm. Maybe I will visit those two. They're pretty friendly." you thought to yourself as you started to walk around. "ZZZZZzzzzzZZZZ!" you hear as you walk near the tables. When you got to them though you see a blue pony with rainbow hair salivating on the table. You think she's cute, so you sit on the other side of the table, and look at her. You notice a dusty book in front of her. It read "World's Fastest Flyers". You reached for it, but you could get it, the bookshelf behind her started falling. "Look out!" you yell as you dash around the table and slam into her, to get her out the way. "What's the big idea!" she yelled at you. After a few seconds a loud CRASH echoed through the library. "That" you say. "Wow you saved me. Thanks." she said as she gave you a nuzzle and started to fly away. "My name's Rainbow Dash by the way. We should race together. Meet me the edge of the Everfree Forest if you want." "Ok" you say as she exited. Now you start pondering about who to go see. After a moment you decide...
122.title: Teardrop, the Brown Pegasus

1221.content:
You decided to visit Twilight and Spike now and Rainbow Dash later.

You flew down the street and ended up at the treehouse (this is set before "Twilight's Kingdom").
You noticed that it wasn't a treehouse in the ordinary sense, but rather a house that was a tree.

You knocked on the door.
Who answers?
1221.title: To go see Twilight and Spike

1222.content:
You decided to see Rainbow Dash now and Twilight and Spike later.

You flew over to the edge of the forest and found Rainbow Dash flexing.
"Okay," she says enthusiastically, "let's race. First one to get to that shop over there and back wins. On your mark, get set, go!"
And you and her take off.

Who wins?
1222.title: To go see Rainbow Dash

1223.content:
You were trying to decide who to visit when a pink Earth mare bounded up to you with an even darker pink, poofy mane and tail.
Her eyes were blue and her cutie mark appeared to be three balloons.
"Hi, I'm Pinkie Pie," she says in an enthusiastic voice.
"I'm Teardrop," you say.
"Teardrop, that's quite a gloomy name but it's pretty," says Pinkie Pie, bouncing up and down. "What are you thinking about?"
"Well, I just met two ponies, one of whom has a dragon in fact, and I can't decide who to visit. The dragon, Spike, his name is, wants me to visit him and his boss Twilight, but this pegasus named Rainbow Dash wants me to meet her by the Everfree Forest."
"Oh, I know them!" says Pinkie Pie. "They're my friends,"

Who does Pinkie Pie suggest you visit?
1223.title: Meeting Pinkie Pie

choices: A triangle holding a single bolt of lightning.
123.content: Lightflash. A bright yellow Pegasus pony with a bright, lightning-shaped aquamarine stripe going through the center of your slightly darker yellow mane. Your cutie mark is ...
123.title: Fan Character

1231.content:
Your cutie mark was a triangle with a lightning bolt on it.
You decide to read a few books about dragons, hoping to research them.
While reading, you meet....
1231.title: A triangle holding a single bolt of lightning.

1232.content: What is your cutie mark? (Sorry about the short chapter)
1232.title: Something else.

choices: A sun with a smiley face.
1233.content: What is your cutie mark?
1233.title: Something else.

choices: Walk up to her, and speak to her
Look for a book to read since you are very shy to say something
124.content: You are a alicorn, just returning from a long bannishment, your tall as Celestia, and blue as Luna, your name is Prince Sunset, your related to Luna and Celestia, ou're theyre big brother, you have a cutie mark with the sun and moon on a black shield. You smile and continue your way to the library. You think of how it might happen, bit when you reach the library, it only had one pony, Twilight sparkle.
124.title: Fan Character

1241.content:
You walk up to the purple pony. "Hello, I'm Prince Sunset," you say.
"Uh, my name is Twilight," says Twilight, looking a bit surprised to see a big Alicorn stallion walk in.
What does Twilight do?
1241.title: Walk up to her, and speak to her

1242.content:
You wanted to talk to the pony, but you were a bit shy and didn't know what to say, so you decided to read instead.
You pick up a book on monsters and begin reading it, but then someone sees you and is surprised as Alicorns are quite rare.
Who sees you?
1242.title: Look for a book to read since you are very shy ...

125.content: Here are some more character slots.
125.title: More character slots

1251.content:
You are an average looking stallion. your brown with a dark-brown mane and cyan eyes.
You are a...
1251.title: Fan character

12511.content: You are walking along a wall of books and you see a purple pony sorting books with magic.
12511.title: Unicorn

125111.content:
You walk over to the purple pony.
"Hello, ma'am," you say. "I'm Cream Puff, who are you?"
"Hi," says the mare. "My name is...
125111.title: Talk to her.

choices: Ask the purple pony for help.
125112.content:
You start looking for a book, but you can't find one you want.
You decide to...
125112.title: Look for a book.

12512.content:
You are a pegasus.
You fly over to the shelves and pick a book on...
12512.title: Pegasus

12513.content:
You are an Earth pony.
You start looking for books when...
12513.title: Earth pony

choices: See if you can make a friend.
1252.content:
You are a red Earth mare named Candy Dancer.

You have a neon green, curly mane and tail and your cutie mark is a magnifying glass.
What do you do now?
1252.title: Fan character

choices: If the slots above are taken...
1253.title: MORE slots!

13.content:
You wanted to go to Rarity's shop to buy some clothes.
You get there and walk in.
It's very neatly decorated and behind the counter is a white unicorn mare with a purple mane and wearing eye makeup.
"Hi, you must be Rarity," you say.
"Yes, indeed, I am," she says.

What do you wish to buy from Rarity?
13.title: Rarity's Shop

choices: You get interupted before you even decide.
14.content:
Not knowing what to do you decided to wonder around without actually knowing where your actually going. You soon reach the centre of Ponyville where you see a bunch of ponies there too. One pony seemed to catch your attention though. The pony is pink and has a pink and has a cutie mark in the shape of balloons. You decide to walk towards her.

"Hi-" you greet before getting intertupted by the pony's big gasp and dashes away from you.

"She probably was just hyperactive." you think.

You don't really know what to do next so you decide to...
14.title: Centre of Ponyville

141.content: You decide to go shopping to buy some...
141.title: Walk over to the shops

142.content:
Without even thinking about it, you decide to walk to the Everfree Forest. You walk towards the forest and are about to enter until you see a pony guarding the forest. She is a pegasus pony with a pink mane and a yellow coat. Her cutie mark represents three pink butterflies.

"Please... don't go into the everfree... forest..." she whispers in a soft voice.

"Why?" you ask.

"because..." she says again this time she didn't complete her sentence.

What do you do?
142.title: Everfree Forest

1421.content:
You progress forward, thinking "That pony was probably just a bit nervy", however, you are a bit scared.
You keep on going until you run into...
1421.title: Go in the forest anyway

14212.content: As your walking through the forest you realize that the sky ia getting dark. You hear a creature and instantly froze. You started to think maybe you should've listened to Fluttershy. You start to run but a creature is blocking your path. What creature IS it?
14212.title: A dangerous creature.

choices: Find someone else to talk to
1422.content: You decide not to go into the forest, because you're moved by the fact that this pony seems to care about your well being. "Ok, if you think I shouldn't." You tell her. "T..thank you." she replyed in a shy whisper. You and her stared at each other awkwardly for a few minutes. You both didn't know where to go from that, so you just stared. Suddenly the pony whined timidly, as if she was scared of you. Before you could say anything, she flew away. Random birds and butterflies started after her as she swiftly fluttered away. "Wow. That pony is a bit too shy." you tell yourself. "Maybe I should follow her. She seems nice enough to care about me. Maybe this town has more ponys like that." After thinking about it for a moment, you decide to...
1422.title: Dont Go in the forest

14221.content:
You decided to follow her, flying because you were a pegasus.
When you catch up to her, you say, "Oh, by the way, thanks for caring enough about my welfare. I'm Dusty Cloud".
"I'm Fluttershy," says the shy pony in a quiet voice.
"Well, Fluttershy," you say. "What's so bad about the forest?"
"It's dangerous," says Fluttershy cowering.

What happens now?
14221.title: Follow the shy pony

14222.content:
You decide to look for somepony else to talk to in hopes they'd be friendly, deciding not to follow the shy pony in case you scared her.
You head off to...
14222.title: Find someone else to talk to

14223.content:
"Hmm," you muse to yourself.
"This pony seems nice, but at the same time, she seems scared of me. Should I follow her or would that scare her too much?"
Just then, someone popped out of a bush and said "Hi!"
Who was it?
14223.title: Interrupted.

143.content:
You see a sign on a building that says, "Library".
"I'll go there," you say. "I like reading".
Is the library the one where Twilight and Spike work?
143.title: Library.

144.content:
You see a farm and decide to walk up to it so you can buy some produce.
Is the farm Sweet Apple Acres?
144.title: Down on the Farm.

choices: It was one of the CMC
145.content: what or Who interrupted you from your decision?
145.title: Interupted

1451.content:
You were wondering where to go when a sky-blue pegasus mare zipped past.
Her mane and tail were rainbow-striped and her cutie mark was a cloud with a rainbow lightning bolt.
"Hi," you say, "I'm Iceflow. Who are you?"
"I'm Rainbow Dash," says the pony.
What happens now?
1451.title: Meeting Rainbow Dash.

1452.content:
You were trying to figure out where to go when a little filly bounced up.
She was...
1452.title: It was one of the CMC

1453.content:
You were trying to figure out where to go when you saw two pegasi going past.
One of them, a mare with blue fur and feathers, rainbow-coloured mane and tail, and a cutie mark of a cloud with a rainbow lightning bolt, was flying and the other, an orange filly with a spiky purple mane and tail, was sort of hopping along like a baby bird that had fallen out of its nest too early.
"Hello," you say. "I'm Honeybee, who are you?"
"I'm Rainbow Dash," says the mare.
"And I'm Scootaloo," says the filly.
"I was just showing Scootaloo here some tricks," says Rainbow Dash.

What do you do now?
1453.title: Meeting Rainbow Dash and Scootaloo.

153.content:
You decide to go to the post office. After all, the employees there deal with plenty of other ponies every day so they must be pretty social right?

Upon walking through the door, you are greeted by a yellow pegasus mare with a cyan mane. "Hi, my name's Raindrops! What brings you here?"

Beyond her, you look through the doorway to the mail room and see a grey mare with eyes that look a little funny. She appears to be busy sorting the mail.

What will you do?
153.title: Post Office

1532.content:
With Raindrops' permission, you enter the mail room and approach the grey pegasus. "Um... hi." You say shyly.

The mare puts down what she's holding and turns to acknowledge you. "Hi! Are you new around here? I haven't seen you at one of Pinkie Pie's parties yet." She's got a cute, bubbly voice.

You nod. "I'm looking around town to meet other ponies."

The pegasus laughs. "Trying to find some friends, huh? I can help get you started with that." She extends out a foreleg and gives you a hoof-bump. "My name's..."
1532.title: Talk to the wall-eyed pegasus

15321.content:
"My name's Derpy Hooves." The pegasus states happily. "I can be your first friend... well, if you want me to."

You smile. "Sure, you seem like a nice pony to be around."

"So, anything you would like to talk about? I have plenty of time before I need to finish sorting the mail, so maybe we can do some activities together."
15321.title: Meet Derpy Hooves

153211.content:
"Hey, Derpy," you say.
"Yes," she replies.
"Why do your eyes go into different directions?"
"Well," said Derpy. "I don't know, I've had them like this for as long as I can remember. I remember once when I was thirteen, my parents sent me to the hospital to try and correct them and they put a bandage over my eyes, but it didn't work. And sometimes they just go straight but they always go back to the way they were".
"I like your eyes," you say.
What happens now?
153211.title: Ask Derpy about her eyes

153212.content:
You were happy that you met this Derpy and wanted to be her friend. She seemed nice and you agreed that doing activities sounded fun.
What do you do?
153212.title: Something else

155.content:
You can't decide where to go, so you just wander around aimlessly.
You keep wandering around until you reach...where?
155.title: Wander

info.brief_description: Because 'MLP' is too mainstream. Yes, I am aware I spelt it wrong.
info.description:
Rules
1. Correct Grammar please.
2. Try to not put to add one-line chapters. I'm not saying that you have to, I'm just saying that you at least try.
3. I encourage... Weight Gain, Shrinking... if you add it After you pass Chapter 15. Otherwise I'll delete it.
4. NO VORE!!!!! It is a Pony-Friendly Story, we do not want blood and bones in somepony's stomach.
5. Make sense in context.

CONTESTS
First person to make a chapter that has Rainbow Dash in it wins 100GP. Scratch that, I forgot who is writing who so just PM me if you want the GP stuff.
